title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions:
Product Name: Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen

This high-quality, stainless steel refrigerator shovel ice scraper is the perfect tool for removing ice and frost from your fridge. Made from a combination of durable stainless steel and PP material, this ice scraper is built to last and withstand heavy use.

Available in three stylish colors - blue, gray, and pink - this ice scraper is not only practical but also adds a pop of color to your kitchen. The product dimensions are 17cm in length and 4.5cm in width, making it the perfect size for household requirements. Please note that actual product measurements may vary by 1-5mm.

The package includes one fridge ice scraper. Please be aware that actual product color may vary slightly due to monitor and lighting differences. This ice scraper is the perfect solution for cleaning ice and frost from your fridge, with its high-quality materials ensuring durability.

So, keep your fridge clean and free of ice and frost with this Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen.
